extendedInfo.description: The LASIK MD application for your iPhone is an interactive way for you to learn more about the LASIK procedure and Canada's leader in laser vision correction - LASIK MD. LASIK MD has been helping Canadians achieve freedom from glasses and contacts for over 10 years, thanks to the leadership of co-founders Dr. Mark Cohen and Dr. Avi Wallerstein, and regional medical directors Dr. Richard LÃ©ger, Dr. Pierre Demers and Dr. Christopher Jackman. LASIK MD has become the only national laser vision correction provider in Canada with 25 clinics - coast-to-coast from Nanaimo to St. John's. They also have clinics in all major metropolitan cities including Vancouver, Calgary, Toronto, Ottawa, Montreal and Halifax. LASIK MD also has the distinction of being North America's largest laser vision correction provider based on procedure volume. Whether you're someone who is considering LASIK for the first time, or you've had the procedure at LASIK MD and would like to ask them a question - everyone will benefit from the FREE LASIK MD App. Increase your knowledge about this life-changing procedure with numerous informative videos and FAQs. Learn more about LASIK MD with a list of available procedures, surgeon bios and clinic locations. The LASIK MD App is also an easy way to submit questions or comments via email. Download the FREE LASIK MD App today!

reviews.comment: A great resource to gather information on Lasik surgery.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Most useful for prospective patients
reviews.comment: TONS of info about LASIK MD in this app...everything from surgeon bios to clinic addresses and phone numbers...even videos about the procedure, which were my favorite part...very informative for anyone considering LASIK.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Karthik
reviews.comment: Gr8 app in which we can gather loads of info abt LASIK
reviews.author: A Google User
